title: Lantern AI Career Assessment - Final
description: Streamlined career assessment with hierarchical branching

questions.text: What is your current grade level and ZIP code?
What do you prefer to work on?

options.label: Hard Hat
options.description: Physical work, building, construction, hands-on technical work

options.label: Non Hard Hat
options.description: Office work, professional services, knowledge-based work

options.label: Unable to decide
options.description: I need help figuring out what type of work I'd enjoy

questions.text: Which type of Hard Hat work interests you most?

options.label: Building, fixing, working with tools
options.description: Construction, plumbing, electrical work and heavy machinery maintenance

options.label: Creating Designs (Architecture/Civil engineers)
options.description: In office architects and engineers

questions.text: Which type of Non Hard Hat work interests you most?

options.label: Working with numbers, data, or analysis
options.description: Accountants, financial analysts, data scientists

options.label: Working with computer or technology
options.description: Software developers, IT specialists

options.label: Helping to empower people through education/coaching
options.description: Teachers, Counsellors

options.label: Helping people to improve their health
options.description: Nurse, medical practitioners, doctors

options.label: Rescue people
options.description: Police officers, firefighters

options.label: Invent or discover new things
options.description: Researchers

options.label: Works with art, creative things
options.description: Photographers, artists, musicians etc

questions.text: What traits best describe you? (Select all that apply)

options.label: Analytical
options.description: I like to break down problems and analyze data

options.label: Creative
options.description: I enjoy coming up with new ideas and artistic expression

options.label: Helpful
options.description: I like to help others and make a positive difference

options.label: Natural Leader
options.description: I often take charge and guide others

options.label: Detail-Oriented
options.description: I pay close attention to details and accuracy

options.label: Problem Solver
options.description: I enjoy figuring out solutions to challenges

options.label: Team Player
options.description: I work well with others and collaborate effectively

options.label: Independent
options.description: I prefer to work on my own and be self-directed

options.label: Good Communicator
options.description: I'm comfortable speaking and writing to others

options.label: Hands-On Learner
options.description: I learn best by doing and working with my hands

questions.placeholder: Describe your interests, hobbies, and activities you enjoy in your free time...

questions.text: What work, volunteer, or hands-on experience do you have?
questions.placeholder: Describe any work experience, volunteer activities, internships, or hands-on projects you've been involved in...

questions.text: Which subjects do you enjoy studying, and how do you rate yourself there?

subjects.label: Art/Creative
subjects.description: Visual arts, music, drama, creative writing

ratingScale.label: Excellent
ratingScale.description: I excel in this subject and really enjoy it

ratingScale.label: Good
ratingScale.description: I do well and generally like this subject

ratingScale.label: Average
ratingScale.description: I'm okay at this subject, neither love nor hate it

ratingScale.label: Struggling
ratingScale.description: This subject is challenging for me

ratingScale.label: Haven't Taken
ratingScale.description: I haven't taken this subject yet

questions.text: How much education are you willing to pursue after high school?

options.label: Certificate or Trade School
options.description: 6 months to 2 years of specialized training

options.label: Associate Degree
options.description: 2-year college degree

options.label: Bachelor's Degree
options.description: 4-year university degree

options.label: Advanced Degree
options.description: Master's, PhD, or professional degree (6+ years)

questions.text: Are there any factors we should consider when suggesting careers?
questions.placeholder: Physical limitations, family considerations, location preferences, financial constraints, or other factors that might affect your career choices...

questions.text: Do you feel you have support for education or training after high school?

options.label: Yes, I have strong support
options.description: Family and/or financial support for education/training

options.label: I have some support
options.description: Limited but available support for education/training

options.label: I have minimal support
options.description: Very limited support, will need to find my own way

options.label: I don't have support
options.description: No family or financial support available

options.label: I'm not sure
options.description: Haven't discussed this with family yet

questions.text: How do you want to be remembered or make an impact? Who inspires you and why?
questions.placeholder: Describe the kind of impact you want to make, how you want to be remembered, and who inspires you (could be someone you know personally, a public figure, or fictional character) and why they inspire you...

hard_hat.name: Hard Hat Career Path
hard_hat.description: For students interested in physical, hands-on, technical work

non_hard_hat.name: Non Hard Hat Career Path
non_hard_hat.description: For students interested in professional, knowledge-based work

unable_to_decide.name: Career Exploration Path
unable_to_decide.description: For students who need help discovering their career interests
